targetHeader: Determine how much you want to consume
privacyContent:
Introduction

Our privacy policy will help you understand what information we collect at Meal Tracker, how Meal
Tracker uses it, and what choices you have.
Meal Tracker was created by Arif Ertugrul as a free app. This SERVICE is provided by Arif Ertugrulat no cost and is intended for use as is.
If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy.
The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions,
which are accessible on our website, unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection and Use

To provide a better experience, the app may ask you to input certain personal information such as
food data and nutrition goals.
However, this data is stored exclusively on your device and is never transmitted to us or any server.
The app uses the external service OpenFoodFacts.org to retrieve food data. When doing so, your IP address may be transmitted as part of the request.
However, no personal linkage is made.

Cookies

Cookies are small files that commonly serve as anonymous unique identifiers. They are sent to your browser from websites you visit and stored in your device's memory.
This app does not use cookies directly. However, third-party code or libraries (such as
OpenFoodFacts) may use cookies to collect information and improve their services.
You can choose to accept or reject these cookies, and be notified when one is being sent.
If you reject cookies, some parts of the Service may not function properly.

Service Providers

We may use third-party services for the following reasons:
Privacy Policy
- To retrieve product and nutrition data (via OpenFoodFacts)
These third parties may receive data such as your IP address for technical reasons.
However, they are obligated not to link this data to your identity or use it for any other purpose.

Security

We value your trust in using our app and strive to protect any local information stored on your
device.
However, please note that no storage method - even locally - is 100 percent secure.
We encourage you to manage your data responsibly using the app's built-in tools.

Children's Privacy

This Service is not directed at children under 13.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
If we discover that a child under 13 has used the app in a way that involves personal data,
we encourage parents or guardians to take appropriate action, including deleting the app data or the app itself.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. You are advised to check this page regularly
for changes.
Any changes will take effect immediately upon being posted here.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
Contact Information:
Email: arif.ertugrul@outlook.com
